description:
Tattoo Studio Simulator – Build Your Own Tattoo Studio!

Are you passionate about tattoo art? Ready to run your own studio? Tattoo Simulator brings the thrill of tattooing and the challenge of managing a business together – exclusively on Nintendo Switch™!

Realistic Tattoo Experience

Listen to your clients, design the tattoos they want, and create unique works of art in different styles. Every customer is different, and every design showcases your creativity.

Manage, Expand, and Upgrade Your Shop

Open your shop daily, welcome customers, and grow your income

Buy cleaning supplies, tattoo needles, and aftercare products

Boost customer satisfaction by offering drinks and extra services

Use your earnings to upgrade your equipment and expand your studio!

Simulation + Creativity = Addictive Gameplay

Tattoo Simulator perfectly blends tattoo artistry with business simulation. You're both the artist and the entrepreneur!

Features:

Realistic tattooing mechanics

Unique clients and customizable designs

Studio upgrades and resource management

In-store item sales and customer care

Daily tasks and business routines

Ready to build your tattoo empire?
Tattoo Simulator lets you dive into the world of ink, unleash your art, and rise to the top!
